SA11sanss03u:24_0: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanss03u:31_0: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyetâiva hi //
SA11sanss03u:34_0: dānais tathâpi satkāraiḥ paripācyêha tān narān /
SA11sanss03u:39_0: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca /
SA11sanss03u:41_0: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca /
SA11sanss03u:43_0: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
SA11sanss03u:45_0: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /
SA11sanss03u:50_0: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ /
SA11sanss03u:51_0: ete dharmā na câsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana //
SA11sanss03u:52_0: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ /
SA11sanss03u:55_0: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam //
SA11sanss03u:57_0: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot //
SA11sanss03u:70_0: ye câpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:72_0: adhimānīn na seveta [[DOUBT]] vinayec câgame sthitān /
SA11sanss03u:76_0: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet /
SA11sanss03u:77_0: kuleṣu câpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet //
SA11sanss03u:78_0: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [[DOUBT]] /
SA11sanss03u:80_0: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:81_0: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cânye tādṛśā janāḥ //
SA11sanss03u:83_0: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cânye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
SA11sanss03u:85_0: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
SA11sanss03u:86_0: na câikaḥ praviśet tatra nâpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
SA11sanss03u:87_0: ayaṃ câparo 'nartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmôktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanss03u:88_0: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyâciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyântike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
SA11sanss03u:90_0: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
SA11sanss03u:91_0: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ
SA11sanss03u:92_0: pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
SA11sanss03u:96_0: apy eva nāmâyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā
SA11sanss03u:102_0: na vayam atrâsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyâsanāt
SA11sanss03u:110_0: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyatîmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.
SA11sanss03u:114_0: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako mahêccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpêcchêti neyaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:115_0: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmêty uktaṃ //
SA11sanss03u:123_0: so 'lpârthatayâlpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca
SA11sanss03u:124_0: bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca
SA11sanss03u:127_0: kathhye vârthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate /
SA11sanss03u:134_0: sa tatra nâtmârthāya pratipanno bhavati na parârthāya /
SA11sanss03u:139_0: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt
SA11sanss03u:144_0: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet
SA11sanss03u:145_0: tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti
SA11sanss03u:147_0: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin
SA11sanss03u:151_0: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair anuttarāṃ sa-
SA11sanss03u:154_0: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
SA11sanss03u:156_0: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate
SA11sanss03u:162_0: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārâṅkuśâviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
SA11sanss03u:163_0: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam anadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍâiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārâṅkuśêti /
SA11sanss03u:167_0: tathā cârabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
SA11sanss03u:172_0: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmârambho 'tivelāyāṃ vâparipakvâdhimukter vā duṣkarakarmârambhas tad yathā
SA11sanss03u:176_0: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena
SA11sanss03u:180_0: nâpy akālêty ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva nôtpādyâbhyāsânārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
SA11sanss03u:181_0: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svârthaghātibhyaḥ piśitâśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś câtmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss03u:187_0: kathaṃ ca kulaputrâtra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihārôpāyakuśalo bhavati /
SA11sanss03u:191_0: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjôpasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanss03u:192_0: ye cânye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgântarāyikās tān sarveṇa
SA11sanss03u:203_0: tena ca kulaputrâitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nâvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanss03u:205_0: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmâdidhātuṃ āsravanti
SA11sanss03u:208_0: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py anarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
SA11sanss03u:209_0: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
SA11sanss03u:215_0: ca satvānām avarṇâyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nâdhyāyâśayenêti asya vivarjanam atrôktaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:216_0: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu
SA11sanss03u:220_0: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
SA11sanss03u:223_0: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām
SA11sanss03u:226_0: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
SA11sanss03u:234_0: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
SA11sanss03u:235_0: svapnântare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ //
SA11sanss03u:238_0: samādāyêti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
SA11sanss03u:240_0: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati //
SA11sanss03u:251_0: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu
SA11sanss03u:254_0: tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehîti //
SA11sanss03u:258_0: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś câdīptaśiraścailôpamena bahūn kalpān /
SA11sanss03u:260_0: tan nâham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ //
SA11sanss03u:267_0: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye
SA11sanss03u:268_0: sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvârambaṇena vīryeṇa yathâham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti /
SA11sanss03u:270_0: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣûdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt
SA11sanss03u:274_0: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
SA11sanss03u:277_0: yasyâdhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
SA11sanss03u:278_0: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya //
SA11sanss03u:279_0: sêtaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
SA11sanss03u:280_0: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham //
SA11sanss03u:283_0: tatra tathāgatâiva sākṣîti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss03u:290_0: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ
SA11sanss03u:295_0: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:296_0: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
SA11sanss03u:298_0: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sâraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena
SA11sanss03u:304_0: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇânulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
SA11sanss03u:305_0: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogâcārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe
SA11sanss03u:312_0: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dāta-
SA11sanss03u:319_0: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena câsya bhavitavyaṃ //
SA11sanss03u:322_0: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:323_0: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena
SA11sanss03u:326_0: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābhôtsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham
SA11sanss03u:329_0: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā
SA11sanss03u:331_0: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
SA11sanss03u:332_0: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss03u:334_0: yā staupikântaśâikadaśâpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
SA11sanss03u:338_0: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe
SA11sanss03u:340_0: tat tatrâiva tathāgatacaitye vātâtapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
SA11sanss03u:341_0: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:342_0: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nâpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ
SA11sanss03u:345_0: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca
SA11sanss03u:352_0: sa tenâkuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrâsyôpapattir bhavati /
SA11sanss03u:358_0: tasya tatra jihvêndriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni
SA11sanss03u:360_0: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatâgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālânukālaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanss03u:363_0: sa tenâkuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrâsyôpapattir bhavati /
SA11sanss03u:365_0: sôdvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
SA11sanss03u:366_0: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇâpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī
SA11sanss03u:368_0: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ-
SA11sanss03u:370_0: bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ vêti //
SA11sanss03u:372_0: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyâkārāṃs te
SA11sanss03u:376_0: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhâkārāṃs te
SA11sanss03u:380_0: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣâkārān patrâkārān
SA11sanss03u:386_0: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjany-ākā-
SA11sanss03u:389_0: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭâkāraṃ sa śrāmaṇerakâsīt /
SA11sanss03u:392_0: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya
SA11sanss03u:395_0: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
SA11sanss03u:396_0: te vṛttā velêti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ
SA11sanss03u:398_0: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukâkāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ //
SA11sanss03u:399_0: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalâkāraṃ so 'pi
SA11sanss03u:403_0: sa tenôktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitvêti /
SA11sanss03u:405_0: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā
SA11sanss03u:409_0: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evâham
SA11sanss03u:414_0: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam
SA11sanss03u:419_0: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
SA11sanss03u:422_0: yady apy evaṃ tathâpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat
SA11sanss03u:427_0: apy eva nāmâitat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
SA11sanss03u:434_0: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyâkārāḥ
SA11sanss03u:436_0: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryâbhibhūtena
SA11sanss03u:439_0: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
SA11sanss03u:440_0: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati //
